name: Restaurant Dream
overview: Restaurant dream let the player build his own restaurant empire. The player can choose the place, the style (there are 4 kind of different restaurants to choose which one will you use), the staff (waitress, cook, etc.) adn you can also buy new items to improve the quality of the service and meals, the player can also hire staff of restaurant rivals or other that are avaliables in the market. Depending of the player answers to the different questions sometimes during the different weeks there will be some events involving the player staff and other restaurants staffs, the player can also date some of his staff. A restaurant prepares and serves food, drink and dessert to customers in return for money. Meals are generally served and eaten on premises, but many restaurants also offer take-out and food delivery services. Restaurants vary greatly in appearance and offerings, including a wide variety of the main chef's cuisines and service models. Manufacturer's description: Restaurant shares NO. Management simulation that contains elements of love aimed at girls anxious to get one. Combo exploded and caused a five piece arranged Ino Makoto chemistry, to aim to double sales. Power is a combo type of change varied by more than 50 combinations. Rou in competition with rivals to find your own combination.
